person.bio: I am cloud system engineer with 7 years experience on different cloud platforms and virtualization. Worked as an application support on tomcat and MySQL platform and on jumpsacle and postgres, Worked on DCPM racktivity application. The company where I learn how to own your project and manage it, like idea of new internet.
person.excerpt: Cloud system engineer with 7 years experience on different cloud platforms and virtualization.
